column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The Art Institute is a staple of Chicago
column2: and an incredible museum! They have student discounts
column3: which cuts the price in half
column4: and coat checks for $1. You could easily spend hours wandering the halls of the museum
column5: but they make it very easy to find major works. The layout as a whole is fairly intuitive to navigate
column6: and there is so much to drink in.
